channel.title: Learning on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: Flashback 2018
item.description: tl;dr, Typical end of the year post as you may expect. Well, 2018 was a significantly productive year for me compared to other years, learned so many things which I wanted to, plus added more things to the bucket list for the coming year.

item.title: How to Learn
item.description: If you search the web for how to learn something, you will surely get a bunch of techniques that would help you to remember something but that is not the learning I am talking about, that is in a sense, a kind of memorization.
